title: The Unkindness of Ravens: A dark comedy thriller about politicians, vampires and journalists
description: The Unkindness of Ravens is a fast-paced, inventive dark comedy thriller about politicians, vampires and journalists.  A trendy black pudding restaurant has opened in Edinburgh. It’s only open at night, and anyone who eats there starts behaving oddly. Meanwhile, a far-right politician is becoming surprisingly popular, and the whitest body in Scotland appears on the floor outside chronically unlucky Martin Harris’s flat. Martin, his disgraced nun sister Maria, his pessimistic slacker friend Rab, charming reformed criminal Tony, naïve cop Acari and mystery blogger laurensorensen seem to be the only people who want to find out how these events are connected and do something about it all...
author: Mark Poole
